sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SENTINEL, Great and Little, are two islands in the Eastern Seas. The first is about ten miles in circumference, and is about twenty miles from the Greater Andaman. Long. 92. 40. E. Lat. 11. 36. N. The second is about eight miles from the Little Andaman. Long. 92. 23. E. Lat. 10. 59. N.
